paragraph: Call us at (720) 613-9706 or (720) 640-6852 or submit your case online for prompt evaluation.

detailsData.title: Trusted
detailsData.content: Over 200 5-star Reviews. Zaner Harden Law has earned the trust of clients with their consistent results and excellent client service.

detailsData.title: Proven
detailsData.content: Our verdicts and settlements are unrivaled. The firm has secured record-breaking verdicts in Colorado, showcasing their expertise and commitment to clients.

detailsData.title: Award Winning
detailsData.content: The firm's attorneys have been recognized by Super Lawyers, 5280 Top Lawyers, and the Million Dollar Advocates Forum, among others.

detailsData.title: Innovative
detailsData.content: Zaner Harden Law has revolutionized personal injury law with novel and cutting-edge legal techniques, ensuring the best possible outcomes for their clients.

subHeading: The recognized leaders in personal injury law
valueProp: Our focus is simple – helping our clients win their case and get their life back on track. You have many choices in selecting a personal injury law firm – if you are looking for the attorney that spends the most on tv or billboard advertising or the lawyer who began practicing in the 1940s and has lost his zeal for the law, we advise you to look elsewhere. If you are looking for the law firm that fights with the most passion for its clients, who has the verdicts, settlements, and accolades to back them up, and who has revolutionized the way personal injury law is practiced, then you need to look no further.

testimonalData.text: After all the pain and suffering I experienced from being t-boned by a drunk driver and dealing with the insurance companies, the Zaner Harden Law team provided the utmost quality and care in helping me to return to my daily life. The empathy they showed me put me at ease knowing Kurt Zaner and his team had my back.
testimonalData.author: Best personal injury lawyer in Denver!

testimonalData.text: 5 Stars is a no brainer when it comes to Zaner Harden Law. Marc and his team really go the extra mile to ensure your case is represented in every aspect of a long and arduous process. It was nice to know that all of those added stresses were taken care of by such a responsible and friendly team! Checks in the bank, Thanks Marc and the funky bunch!
testimonalData.author: The team is outstanding to work with.

testimonalData.text: Kurt, Monica, & the whole team involved with my family & I's case did an outstanding job beyond my expectations. This was my first time being involved in a suit, and I couldn't have asked for it to go any other way. The firm made sure we were taken care of, and in my opinion did their utmost best. I would recommend them 10 times over to anyone searching for a lawyer.
testimonalData.author: Zaner Harden Law is the Best.
